caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 81–87. Characters of Vespinae . 81–84,
Vespula germanica
(Fabricius)
. 81, head in dorsal view. 82, head in frontal view. 83, head in lateral view. 84, pronotum in lateral view. 85–87,
Vespa orientalis
Linnaeus
, head. 85, lateral view. 86, dorsal view. 87, frontal view. Scale bars = 1 mm.

Remarks: All of these species have been previously recorded from Iran (see
Carpenter, 1996
). In addition, the following species have been recorded from Iran , but were not collected:
Polistes ( Polistes ) atrimandibularis Zimmermann
,
P. ( Polistes ) biglumis (Linnaeus)
,
P. ( Polistes ) indicus Stolfa
, and
P. ( Gyrostoma ) olivaceus (DeGeer)
.
